TopicTitle: Help with landing on the mun?

Articles.Content:
Hello, fellow kerbonauts. So I've been enjoying the game a lot in the past few months. Sadly, I run at a slow pace, and only now am begginning to be able to land on the mun and come back. Sadly, I've ran into a small problem.

I want to make a permanent munar base. One would think that is easier than going there and coming back, except I have the mod Zoxygene. I can get to the mun and come back, but the problem is, when I try to lower the drills, most of the times they break for some reason. Help with this would be appreciated :\
